attributes.title: Black Ops 4 - Whiteout
attributes.caption: When snow falls on Black Ops 4 Blackout, the guys decide to take a break from bleeding out from bullets. Their new favorite pastime is bleeding out from snowballs.
attributes.description: When snow falls on Black Ops 4 Blackout, the guys decide to take a break from bleeding out from bullets. Their new favorite pastime is bleeding out from snowballs.

attributes.title: RED DEAD VALENTINE - Red Dead Redemption 2: Online
attributes.caption: We wanted to share our love with you by making an old-time Valentine's Day postcard in Red Dead Redemption 2: Online.
attributes.description: We wanted to share our love with you by making an old-time Valentine's Day postcard in Red Dead Redemption 2: Online.
attributes.display_title: RED DEAD VALENTINE - Red Dead Redemption 2: Online

attributes.title: NESSY EASTER EGG - Apex Legends
attributes.caption: Geoff, Ryan, and Matt squad up in Apex Legends to try and uncover the mystery of the illusive Lochness Monster.
attributes.description: Geoff, Ryan, and Matt squad up in Apex Legends to try and uncover the mystery of the illusive Lochness Monster.

attributes.title: Crackdown 3 - Tether Tantrum
attributes.caption: Matt discovers that playing with tethers in Crackdown 3 can cause massive destruction to the game's physics engine.
attributes.description: Matt discovers that playing with tethers in Crackdown 3 can cause massive destruction to the game's physics engine.

attributes.title: Longest Gunpowder Barrel Chain! - Sea of Thieves
attributes.caption: Sea of Thieves has made getting gunpowder barrels easier than ever in it's newest update. Let's try and do some crazy stuff with them!
attributes.description: Sea of Thieves has made getting gunpowder barrels easier than ever in it's newest update. Let's try and do some crazy stuff with them!
attributes.display_title: Longest Gunpowder Barrel Chain! - Sea of Thieves

attributes.title: Chaining Gunpowder Between Two Islands - Sea of Thieves
attributes.caption: We make a 200+ gunpowder barrel explosion between two islands.
attributes.description:
We make a 200+ gunpowder barrel explosion between two islands.
Our last gunpowder barrel chains were insane, but we wanted to go bigger. Now we're chaining over 200 barrel explosions between two islands. Our Sea of Thieves gameplay has never looked this majestic.
attributes.display_title: Chaining Gunpowder Between Two Islands - Sea of Thieves

attributes.title: Can You Survive the Garden of Salvation at 100 Light?
attributes.caption: Destiny's raids have always been a massive challenge even when you're at max level. How hard must they be when you're as far from max as possible?
attributes.description: Destiny's raids have always been a massive challenge even when you're at max level. How hard must they be when you're as far from max as possible?
attributes.display_title: Can You Survive the Garden of Salvation at 100 Light?

attributes.title: Can the President Cause a Voidout? - Death Stranding
attributes.caption: What happens if you wait the 48 hours it takes for a dead body to explode in Death Stranding? And what if that dead body was also your mom's?
attributes.description: What happens if you wait the 48 hours it takes for a dead body to explode in Death Stranding? And what if that dead body was also your mom's?
attributes.display_title: Can the President Cause a Voidout? - Death Stranding
